sentence.text: Love the app Very easy to use no problems!!
Cool It made my pinning more interesting. Keep up the good work!
Love it! Fantastic ideas and inspiration for my crafty projects. So easy to use and simple to save to my own boards.
Awesome Application Wonderful place to share products, art, makeup, home furnishings, helpful tips, how to do, and recipes galore!
Great sharing Love to be able to search and find exactly what I want! Also makes preparing a menu easier! It's awesome to have exactly what I have pinned all organized, just for me!
Love it Perfect and so easy to use

Fare Still having problems, I got foreclosed on like 20 times last night and still aren't able to change my password or access my boards, it's as if my Pinterest has been compromised!)-: please fix this issue so that I can get back into enjoying my Pinning. Thx Pinterest!
2\1\14 Will not let me share recipes with any of my friends.
Wonderful App Very addictive, and a lot of fun. Get to share some really cool pictures, ideas, jokes and recipes.

Cool I'd always heard about pinterest but I never really good into it at all because I didn't understand it. I understand it now and it's really very fun to find things snag pin them. Also pinning things from all over the internet.
Pretty awesome Liked everything about it. Wish there was a way to save some of the photos though..
Amazing I love that I can even upload my own personal photos and have them as a pin!!
I love all the great things I find and the ease of pinning them. :-)
Love it Great app. Which there was a way to multi check pins When editing (deleting or moving to another board) rather than having to do it one at a time.
Wonderful, and very helpful app! Pintrest is a magnificent app, because it is very helpful when I want to save websites, photos, and recipes!
Love love love. I'm a crafter so when I have time and feel inspired I get on here and browse. I spent entirely too much time on here, but its so addictive!

Awesome app but... Add the option of controlling the quality of pictures loaded do that less data usage is incurred. Also please stop auto loading of images in feed section. Add the tap to load or swipe down to load options!!

aspectTerm.term: stop auto loading of images in feed section
Add swipe down to load options

sentence.text: Video playback sucks This is a wonderful app minus the videos. To play one it takes you to an internet browser, then to youtube. Please allow for in-app playback to bypass all the nonsense.
Love it Great app, but a lot of repeated items.
Very useful. Enjoy using it.
What the heck? Love the program BUT since you added the 'share this pin' option I have been receiving spam that my friends did not send. My account was hacked too. How about a fix???
Inspiring! Collecting your favorite things is fun to do as well as trying to express your likes and interests to others.
Awesome app!1 Love the app. Only problem that it freezes and shuts down frequently. I hope they fix it. I know they get a lot of traffic.
Love it. I'm addicted. Plus, everything I asked to fix has been fixed, so thanks for listening to us and making your updates worth it!
What's up with the searching? Every time I try to look up something it never really gives me what I want (can someone fix this please?) , but above that it's a very good app.
Great place! There are so many varieties of options to go through on this site. Nice to have access to all of it.

Obsessed I always see, read, and watch things that I think are cool and Pinterest is a good way to keep them in a place to access later. It's also really nice for finding like minded people to follow who are all collecting things they also think are cool which gives a fresh feed of coolness tailored to me.
Love....... What else can you say, simply put this is a wonderful, awesome app filled with awesomeness!!!
New update= NO The new update sucks it doesn't let you look at all the pins and is always shutting down I wish they would revert back to the old one.
Great app. Easy to use and super quick.
Multiple Sign In's I have a personal Pinterest and one I use for my business, it would be nice to be able to easily go back and forth between accounts

aspectTerm.term: go back and forth between accounts

sentence.text: Awesome I love pinterest.. its a place where I can keep all the things I like and are interested in, in one place

Love it! Such inspiration! Pinterest is highly addictive and dont know that I could survive without it now.. jk of course. . But seriously, very great app. Lots of USEFUL information and creative ideas! And to boot ...its a free app to enjoy endlessly! No tech problems. Just superb through and through!
I dislike the update on the news feed, I don't want to see in which boards my pins are being pinned to... I prefer the old feed.

Thank you, thank you! It's fixed! I LOVE Pinterest over all other apps! I now know how it feels to be addicted to something, but I get a great deal of enjoyment from it! It's the most simple way to collect & organize interests, and new ideas. It is an almost too good to be true awsome app! The only draw-back I see is when I'm using pinterest, time goes by sooo fast.... I recommend this app & tell people who are looking for a certain pattern, "I have that exact pattern on Pinterest!"
Ugh It force closes after about 45 seconds of browsing. This happened with the new update. Please fix

The new update is horrible. What the hell is wrong with this new update? It was highly unnecessary. Pinterest was perfect before but now it's terribly messed up. Type in a name and not one board nor pin of the person or the thing appears. It's VERY frustrating since I myself am addicted to pinning. PLEASE fix, immediately.
Very easy to use and very helpful So cool
Love this app. It's quick, when i pin something it goes up immediately. Can't live with out it
Love it Good ideas and you can find whatever u need for any occasion
Love it...maybe too much App is easy to use and navigate. I use it to look for everything from recipes to gifts to random humor. I may need a pinterest intervention soon!
Excellent I love it. I can pin everything I like and send pictures and quotes to my girlfriend.

Wtf I was happily pinning away when I got a msg telling I'd reached my pin limit. Wtf? Look, if we are going to have limits of what I can pin, then I am going to delete this app and my account. That's just stupid. Plz fix. I love Pinterest but if I can't get the same quality of service I've been used to....well...what's the point

aspectTerm.term: limits of what I can pin

sentence.text: Love the info, pics, and people Love it
Pinterest Its an excellent and easy way to post what you're doing. It just keeps getting better and better I just loved all the postings and all that share.

Confusing If you have never used Pintrest it is confusing. Now they have a new mapping thing that you have to say if you want to use every pin. Also pops up for you to rate it at every log in so save yourself the annoyance and rate it right away.
I am a little bit in love with pinterest! very addictive, a little slow though!
Love it I love, love, love being able to pin things on the run I love being able to access those pins on the run! If only I could text a pin or the link to friends that aren't pinners yet.
Love it! Love the site and love the app I spend the most of my time online browsing through Pinterest
Excellent app The first versions of this were a little slow but now the app is great. It has my favorite UI of all my most used apps.
Great app! I am so addicted to pinning on my 20+ boards.

Eh It stops suddenly, kicks me out. And I have to load it because its the ONLY way I can use it on my phones browser which isn't the mobile site anymore. All tiny like the app. Not as appealing as it was when it started out
Great This so is awesome, great app that lets you share ideas and things you like.
Informative! Very Enjoyable!!!
Addictive! Love saving things to read later and finding so many crafty ideas!!
Na Design needs a more straight forward menu to navigate features
Addictive I love to pin the things that interest me and watch as other people enjoy my pinning.
I love this app just wish it was available for every site i visited.. Would recommend.
:) I love it, a lot less messy and much convenient than a real bulletin board or scrapbook
Why run at startup?? Asking for unnecessary permissions Also I do not want the app to run at startup! I would rather uninstall this.
Somethings wrong wuth search!!!! This used to be my favorite app but now when i try to search something nothing related to my search comes up. Please please fix this!!!
Perfect boredom killer Plus great recipe filer/ project planner
Love this app! Super simple layout and easy to use on mobile device. Happy with the updates especially the quick pin and like capability!
Cant log in Cant seem to log in using my google account. It keeps saying log in error. Please help.
Love to Pin it! I love pintrest. Super fun ideas and the app works great most if the time. Sometimes it spools but not very often.
New updates force close... Please fix. This new update causes the app to stop all the time and it's irritating. Please fix and I'll go back to five stars.

Sumsang GNote 1 Still prefer the 1St version. Easy to Pin from Mobile. Feb 7,14: Can't view the photos anymore (if there's no HTTP link). Can that be fix? Sometimes the photo itself is too small, u can't even know what others' posting.
Keeps telling me to reset my password,because it is in safe mode,but will not send me the email to do so!
Update version sucks! Search doesn't work.
Luv pinning! I actually do alot of the pins been a success so far!?
Loved it I loved it, but it took up way to much space.

Love this app! Sometimes I get lost with time because it is so addicting. It is so fun to look at everything and pin your likes or needs to your own boards. I also use a lot of the ideas I get from Pinterest in my classroom, and I have used DIY ideas for my home!
15/2 Update What's happened to this app? The people I follow page isn't working properly, the images disappear and nothing happens when it's refreshed! It's been all good until now. Fix it please.
Miss the 'popular' section Definitely a pinterest addict.
Jfk702 Great apps to share thought and pic...
Excellent!!!! Love Love Love!!!! I have so many new recipes and design ideas. Its so fun to see what friends like and pin also.
great way to save favourite things love it but constant emails irritating
Quotes <3 The option to save is great.
One of my favourite if not the favourite social networking sites Use it every day to find and store lots of interesting and lovely things
Easy to use. Not driven by advertising. Always full of things that are interesting to me without chasing me or interrupting my enjoyment with endless advertising.
Great tool!!! I use this to organize my life.
Update issues! As soon as this was updated it will no longer give me accurate search results! Please fix pinterest!

I love pinning! I love pintrest and this app lets me use it anywhere. The only problem I've had is that if i turn my phone sideways, the screen gets messed up and i have to exit out of the app....please fix!
Love this app This app is fantastic and very user friendly

? it! Me and kids adore pinterest. They have a lot of room ideas for my girls. And help me with ideas for parties and all kinds of gathering and celebrations. Also lets me post my crafty side and get more feedback. Thanks pinterest! :)
all in one spot From hair styles, to do-it-yourself ideas, fashion ideas to quotes... It's all in one spot! It's wonderful!

Useful, improved Happy with the progress on this app but there are many updates that seem to make no change. Can't see the names of many boards - there needs to be a wrapped text function on board names so long board names can be seen. Indexing is very slow too, many of my pins take weeks to come up in search.

Although I am an avid Pinner, this app keeps knocking me out of my Pinning time, therefore making my search have to start over. Very irritating. Also slows down a ton when I open another board besides my own. Please fix these problems! I want to Pin more!
Sorry for the low score. I love the great things you can find here. But very discouraged when I go to do a something that I get advertisements for a ton of other stuff.
Best App Ever! Inspiration and ideas from around the globe.
Super useful From the fashion to the DIY anything you might need want to try is on here super super useful
Amazing app!!! Love it :D Fully like an online scrap board... Awesome idea :)
Love it I love everything about the pinterest app. The only thing it's missing is being able to change the cover photos on the boards.

aspectTerm.term: change the cover photos on the boards

sentence.text: Updates not so good.. Agree with others who commented about "sub boards", definitely would be great for holidays. I also wouldn't mind an option to pin to multiple boards. It would make it easier for me to find things that would fit under more than one of my boards, I often have to look to see where I decided to put it. Could care less about location pinning.
Used to be great Now I cannot see anything from the people or boards I'm following. Pretty frustrating.
;)....:-/.....:-(( Just great usually....but since latest update unable to send pins. Big frowny face.
Useful Awesome way to discover new stuffs
I'm loving it. Mind you it does keep freezing up.
Great! Only complaint is being able to change the picture that represents your boards. And just a user friendlier way to change settings and customize/add pictures to your boards.

Wtf I just did the update and the dang thing won't give me accurate search results. And I know its messed up because i JUST searched for the same thing and got word for word results in the boards section. What the heck?!
Great app I really love this app. Very entertaining and educational.
Go to app Super easy and convenient. Pinning, sending, editing, and making new boards- easy to use!
Happy Girl At last. Been waiting for this app. And now i have it i am very pleased. Much easier to navigate.
Perfecto! Well, couldn't ask for more... but you, please, don't stop introducing more updates...
What an amazing app So many ideas, and inspirations, love it ;)
Fabulous. :) I love having this app! It always loads quickly and runs great.
Cool Good place to go if you need an idea for almost anything
Awesome! I love this app so much! I do wish I could change my board cover and have more categories like on the website.
Excellent Beautiful sharing of beautiful pictures, ideas ideas! Love Peace Thank you

Obsessed I love this app. I prefer using it on my ipad than my phone as the clarity of the pictures are incredible. Great photos, great inspiration for things. Helping me in role as a part time wedding planner. Easy to use and love how there's no Internet trolls on here. Just happy people!
Easy to use Screen shots can be a little small
Love this app!! Love using this app to find fun foods and funny things to brighten up my day
Love it Ive never had any problems. Uploads and searches are fine
I love it Easy to use
Constant issue with confirming email address Got bored went back to Tumblr
So much fun! I absolutely love pinning projects, recipes and travel ideas. I can get lost for hours.
Awesome Loving it. Easy to use with good content.
Excellent for keeping visual ideas I really use this to keep recipes, and fashion ideas, but overall great app.
Ideas for everything This app is great for artistic projects and other creative tasks
5 to 3 Latest update causes page to scroll down on its own everytime opening a pin..ANNOYING! Pls fix!

Glitchy, unintuitive & frustrating Drove me up the wall in a couple days had uninstalled it was that bad. I'm pretty tech savvy and for love nor money couldn't get this to work. Could pin but not see my own boards to retrieve the pins! It kept trying to divert me to Google play to download the app... Whilst using the app! Overall not worth me bothering, I'll stick with chrome bookmarks or G+ things to retrieve stuff. A shame, coz the pin boards are pretty and a nice idea... Assuming one can find them again!
It's allot of fun You can find all kinds of stuff without searching all over the internet!!
If you can't beat them, join them Great place to find interesting images and to lose a few hours a day

I've been addicted forever, The only thing I would change is that over time, I want it more organized so I make another board. I wish there was a 'move pin' button to place it to another board. current technique is having to repin, then delete it from the old board.

Great app but...... I wish I could move pins, from one board to another, in bulk instead of one by one. When I edit my boards it takes too long to move one pin at a time. Other than that I love the app
Love pinterest Love it, only downside is the quality of the pictures are a lot lower on the app than the website when used on computers
Love it I love how I can save recipes, clothing ideas, and work outs.

Search doesn't work anymore After the update, the search function doesn't work. It keeps putting 20's within the search so nothing comes up. Please fix, otherwise the app is useless if I can't search for anything.
Awesome! Love this app! Some of the updates are annoying, but it's still great.
One thing needed You should be able to have sub-boards For example. You would have the board Food. Then on the board food you could have a sub board for dessert. Or healthy. Our brunch.

Really fun A few small glitches when loading some pins but other than that no problems. HTC 4G android. Update I'm using a Samsung galaxy S4 now and pinterest is still great. I wish I could make more adjustments from my phone , but I still have to use the regular laptop to change pin cover photos and to rearrange boards.
Awesome app!!! Super easy to use. Fantastic resources!
Matters of Interest Simple to use. Easy setup.
I love it It's a place for me to see fandom stuff and funny photos.
Love it! So vast and so many creative ideas -
Love it! You can search just about anything, pin it and go back to it later.

Love Pinterest One of my favorite social media channels, and this app lets me have most of it's functions, but I've been getting lags and errors lately. Plus, can you add the function, like Twitter, to switch between accounts? Cheers!
Love it This app is great I get most of my recipes fron it and loys of great decorating ideas for parties

Only one issue: All of a sudden, I'm being sent many, MANY pins every day from people I don't know. All of them are for work-at-home "opportunities" and e cigarettes. I DO NOT like being spammed on Pinterest! Please add some way to block pins from people I don't follow! This is INCREDIBLY irritating!
Galaxy tab 3 Love pinterest, app works well, have it both on phone and tab
??? Great app. Runs smoothly and gives you everything you expect from Pinterest.
Bots? I would rate it higher i love the app but it says there are bots on my network and i cannot fix it
Good Easy to use
Great app Occasionally freezes or has errors loading & pinning. I have also had issues refreshing feed at times...but otherwise great app.
A giant picture filing cabinet!! I love it Easy to use and relatively stable app. Just wish it would STOP suggesting I share pins with my friends
Love this app Lets you keep all things you find interesting in one place
